questionText: Where did this brave mouse's journey begin?
correctAnswer: New Mexico, USA (the home of cheese legends)
incorrectAnswers: Disneyland Paris, France (no, it wasn't a holiday)
Burgenland, Austria (with a glass of wine)

questionText: When did the first mouse set foot on the galactic cheese road?
correctAnswer: 31.08.1950 (wanted to conquer the universe, like the jet planes wanted to conquer the Atlantic)
incorrectAnswers: 22.07.1951 (wanted to make its journey as fast as the first nuclear submarine)
14.07.1949 (the mouse was a real pioneer - the moon came later)
200 BC (Archimedes already had crazy ideas back then!)

questionText: What was the name of the brave mouse?
incorrectAnswers: Jerry (the cheese lover from the neighbourhood)
Mickey (Disney has no rights to it)

questionText: Which cheese was the first to make it into space?
correctAnswer: Le Brouère (the cheese that made the Eiffel Tower jealous)
incorrectAnswers: Comté (thought there was fondue in orbit)
Emmentaler (the one with the holes for air resistance
None yet (the cheese lobby is working on it!)

questionText: When did the cheese finally make it into space?
correctAnswer: 07.02.2010 (when the cheese won its ”world champion title’)
incorrectAnswers: 31.08.1950 (that's when the mouse tried to smuggle it in)
29.02.1951 (the cheese was waiting for a leap year portal)

questionText: Why did this heroic mouse's dream fail?
incorrectAnswers: Reaction to the anaesthetic (the cheesy reverie was too intense)
Old age (the galactic years count double)
Cheese deprivation (a true tragedy for any mouse)
